companies.name: SenecaGlobal
companies.details: Joined as a Senior Software Engineer with the role of Independent Contributer. Growing daily by learning new things and challenging myself. Getting my hands dirty with Design Patterns, SOLID Principles, Agile Practices, Microservices, etc.

companies.name: ValueCoders
companies.details: Worked as an integral part of the team at ValueCoders. Had a great time there as a full-time Full Stack Developer. Got my hands on Laravel, Vuejs, Elasticsearch, Symfony, etc. Gave a lot of training to the team members and associate developers.

companies.name: Sparx IT
companies.details: My Full Stack Development journey started here. Developed and worked with a great team to build some of the very interesting products with a very collaborative and great management. Worked on Laravel, Node.js, Vuejs, JQuery and similar technologies here.

companies.name: HestaBit
companies.details: Started my career as a Backend Developer mainly in PHP and Laravel. Learned a lot and grew with HestaBit for 2 years. Found some great collegues there. Great management and people to work with.
